post.body: True that, my research has me bothered, if we look back history reinvents itself and we are in the midst of a new invention
Thank you, I hope you will participate in discussions
I'm with ya, the problem I see is that it will cure diseases and we won't know if we have been subjected to the nano-technology
Also keep in mind that the term cycle will have a different definition in the future
There are many questions still to be answered but they will be answered.
figures :)
We are going to have a traditional Ukrianian Meal Christmas day
we are doing a traditional Ukrainian Christmas meal this year
Moron
I talked to Grandma and told her what to do
If technology could allow you to live to be 200 years old, would you want the technology?
What's with the API limit in TweetDeck?
It looks like the BIG snow has missed us, we got some but not much...Bummer :(
What do you want for Christmas, make more money? Tell me, Tell me, Tell me what ya really want at: http://bit.ly/BBz2
My TweetDeck is failing....ACK!!!!!
Internet Marketer or Internet Scammer...which one are you? Who can you trust?
Just got up, looked outside and some snow fell, we have more coming today....Happy First Day of Winter to all!
Before the storm hits :)
